participant_1.name: Mike Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and supportive, always encouraging his kids in sports.
participant_1.background: i coach little league baseball. i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

participant_2.name: Linda Smith
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, she loves exploring new places and cultures.
participant_2.background: i'm a librarian. i really like to travel. i have visited spain a times. i think i will retire in a few years. i am 60years old.
